summary: The player plays an unemployed man who travels to the other world, where the goddess grants him magical powers and embarks on a journey to save the world... But there seems to be some secret behind this?

name: Is It Wrong to Repay the Debt in a Dungeon?
summary: To repay the debt, both Akane and her mother have to earn a lot of money! Explore the dungeon, challenge strong enemies, and even use her own body! Everything she is trying to do is for saving her family!!

name: Isekai Tragic Love
summary:
Love, friendship, betrayal & fighting demons!!
But, at what cost wlll he pay for this powerful strength?

name: Isochronism
summary: Rune wakes up in a surreal landscape, only to be asked to solve riddles for unknown reasons. Accompanied by their friend Shara they shall see just how deep the rabbit hole goes.

name: Island_Name_Here
summary: Play as the developer of a tropical island game in this unique puzzle adventure! Edit various object properties to achieve your goals and unlock more of the story. Experiment, undo, and repeat; no action is irreversible. Flex your creative skills to make an experience that is entirely your own!

name: Island Defender Jets
summary: Island Defender Jets is a simple and easy-to-pick-up combat flight simulator where you have to destroy enemy ships, tanks and cruise missiles to protect your island, particularly the airports on it. Fuel, missiles and planes are limited, so use them wisely.

name: Isekai Harem Saver
summary:
Isekai Harem Saver is a novel game in which the protagonist "Daigo", saves the world of harem while encountering various incidents.
This Bishojo Game originally released under the "Genyukyo" brand has been reworked for the "CS Novels" so that they can be enjoyed by players all over the world.

name: Isekai Brick Breaker
summary: Enjoy the sounds. Crush enemies and collect loot. Gain experience and improve skills. Open chests and equip gear. Complete quests and get rewards. Buy equipment in the shop with coins.

name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Kuroro Edition
Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Chartier Edition
summary: In a universe where the Earth has merged with another world, the hunt for a bride from another world begins!

name: Isolation
summary: Open world, multiplayer, zombie survival game where you battle the undead in a hostile environment. Explore the the hidden secrets of the moon and find a escape from the horrors that await.

name: Island of AIto: Life After Death
summary: Life after death is a small horror-themed story DLC for Island of Aito.

name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Kullulu Edition
summary: In a universe where the Earth has merged with another world, the hunt for a bride from another world begins!

name: Iso
summary: Join the robot Nem0-1 to collect photos of the animals inhabiting a post-human planet Earth filled with breathtaking sights and mysterious habitats. Complete your compendium by taking better photos, outsmart dangerous predators and explore the ruins of humanity.

name: Isaiah 24:4-6
summary: A curse consumes the earth; its people must bear their guilt.

name: Isolated Room
summary: What to do when your days are not going well? What to do when you need to wake up and manage a troubled life, in which you need to work, eat well, and still have time for yourself? Isolated Room is about that, and maybe a little more.

name: Is This Undertale
summary: A short Yume Nikki/Undertale fan-game made for Dream Diary Jam.

name: I Spy: Challenger!
summary: I Spy Challenger! is a video game released for the LeapFrog Leapster. This is a re-release of the I Spy Challenger! game for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Isonzo: Royal Units Pack
summary: The 'Royal Units' pack expands the German faction by introducing the uniforms of 2 major states within the "Deutsches Reich": Bavaria and Württemberg. It contains 2 sets of uniforms for all classes, a special officer uniform, 5 mustaches and 5 facial items.

name: Islands and Ships logic puzzle
summary:
Islands and Ships logic puzzle has a really delightful gameplay and it can be a great brain training tool for you as it features 1700+ logical problems divided into 1700+ levels and will allow you to have a lot of fun while providing amazing brain exercise.
You can enjoy this solitaire logic puzzle game offline for hours anytime, and it's free to download!

name: Island Bender
summary: Island Bender is a physics-based couch-fighting earthbending game with up to 6 players. Throw rocks at each other, collect power-ups, and master your bending style to beat your opponents.

name: Isle of Leil
summary: Isle of Leil: is a first person stealth horror game set on a desolate island frozen in time. Face the terrors that roam on the island. Use your wit to distract and sneak around the island. Avoid the darkness, find your parents and make it out alive!

name: IsoChess
summary: Play chess online, vs AI, or vs a local player in our clean 2D and 2.5D chess game.

name: Isle of Swaps
summary: Grab your cards, it's time to swap! Battle your school pals in this roguelite deckbuilder where you'll trade for new cards when you win defeat them and rip open booster packs looking for rare cards. Conquer everyone's dungeon decks to become Critter Champion of the Playground!

name: Isekai Rondo
summary:
Sho, a young man who spends his days in an exploitative company in modern Japan, is reincarnated into a parallel universe as Shaw, due to an accident!
While the job given in his new life is 'Unemployed' and hardships continue with a bad luck party, one day he acquires the ultimate job as a Sage, suddenly becoming the strongest with ultra rare passive skills!
Aiming for the long-awaited mellow life he finds himself in a battle to defeat the Overlord after meeting the Hero Viola.
With exceptional passive skills that for example can change the future by returning before Game Over, get rid of enemies in turn-based battles by summoning spirits or managing mana plants, or even use the skills of monsters!
Complete quests and raise the guild rank so you can challenge deeper dungeon or other adventuring parties, too! With other elements such as a battle arena and the dungeon where treasure chests are automatically generated, your adventure against the Overlord's Army will surely be an unparalleled quest to finally gain a calm, modest life!

name: Isowords
summary: The cult classic word search game on a cube is back, and better than ever!

name: I Spy Spooky Mansion
summary: Through the creaking gate, you'd best beware. A spooky mansion awaits...Enter if you dare! In I SPY: Spooky Mansion Deluxe a mischievous skeleton traps you inside her spooky mansion challenging you to find the secret way out. Explore a mysterious old house full of puzzles and mysteries!

name: I.S.A. Calendar Photoshoot 2023
summary: Good day. Today you will be playing the role of a renowned photographer. The International Space Agency has commissioned you to photograph a team of astronauts to publish a charity calendar for 2023.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip
summary: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Isekai Mario
summary: Isekai Mario is an unofficial freeware fan game that adds anime characters to the world of Super Mario. You can play as hundreds of different anime characters and collect hundreds of power stars in this 3d platformer.

name: Isoball
summary: Use the blocks, arrows, ramps, and bridges that are provided in the area at the bottom to build a track for the ball to get to the hole without falling and breaking. Click on a piece in the bottom area and click on a place to place it. Click on a piece repeatedly in the bottom area to rotate it.

name: Isekai Junior Manager
summary: A protagonist reborn in a noble family of an Isekai was exiled after being deemed useless. With the skills of a misfit and modern knowledge, he aims to be the number one manager in the Isekai!

name: Ispherical
summary:
Do you like Magic, Wizards and Fairies? Help the little Wizard guiding his Sphere through the levels by making and breaking blocks.
Tailor the environment to your needs and build a safe passage for the Sphere to the exit.
But watch out - the evil is always there and everywhere!

name: Is This Weapon?
summary: Dodge! fighting! upgrade! Every time you level up, you can gain abilities, use various combinations, and survive in the endless stream of monsters!

name: Iso Racer
summary: Iso Racer is a top-down multiplayer racing game with a focus on realistic driving physics combined with drifting. It features a variety of circuits, cars, and the ability to personalize and upgrade vehicles. It's a great pick-up-and-play experience for both casual and hardcore racing fans.

name: Island Clicker
summary:
Welcome to Island Clicker – where every click opens the door to an unexplored world!

Explore the Island: Chop down your first tree, crack open your first stone, and step by step, delve deeper into the mysteries of this enigmatic island. The further you venture, the more resources you find, and with each upgraded tool, you become even stronger!

Tame Loyal Companions: Don’t face this adventure alone! Find and tame a monkey to work tirelessly by your side, a wolf ready to tear through your enemies, or a cat that brings you the kind of luck you’ve only dreamed of.

What Do the Shadows Hide?: The island is filled with secrets – from a strange broken totem by the lake to a mysterious bunker hidden among the trees. What are these places, and how can you access them? What secrets do they hold? Perhaps the answers lie behind doors that are still locked. Can you unravel all the mysteries that this land holds?

name: Island
summary: Nature Clan: Island, otherwise simply known as Island, is an installment of the Nature Clan series. Its hardware is VT02 (Famicom), like with every other Nature Clan title.

name: I Spy School Days
summary: I Spy is the fourth game in an educational game series based on the series of children's hidden object books.

name: Is It Wrong To Try To Rescue Monster Girls From The Inquisition?
summary: Solve otherworldly puzzles, rescue quirky monster girls and uncover the secrets of the kingdom together in this light-hearted isekai visual novel.

name: I Swear this Hentai Game was a Gift
summary: A relaxing puzzle game with cute anime girls. You didn't buy this game; it was a gift. We believe you.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Deluxe Edition
summary: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Isha no Mahou Toshoshitsu
summary: Isha's Magical Library is an indie roguelike game in Japanese, published in 2023. It is free to play.

name: Isegyemeideu
summary: Mansion Made Love Simulation Game

name: Isop0dyssey
summary: trash-infested power fantasy sandbox with puzzle, racing & crustacean elements set in the gritty, segregated world of ocean floor society

name: IShoot
summary: iShoot is an artillery combat game in which tanks blast each other with a wide range of high-powered weapons, from basic shells and cluster bombs to the world-destroying Shiva Bomb.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Extended Edition
summary: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Ultimate Edition
summary: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: I Spy Fun House
summary: Solve I Spy riddles to earn tickets to a Fun House, a topsy-turvy world where nothing is as it appears! Master brain-teasing puzzles and play exciting games while exploring the Fun House. The game is based on I Spy Fun House and is a remake of the DS version of this game.

name: Island Notes
summary: Shipwrecked on a mysterious island, choose self-preservation or alliances. Master base-building, farming, fishing, romance and pet taming in this morally-charged survival simulator that blends strategy with human drama. Forge bonds, conquer nature, and evolve your humanity.

name: IsoWords
summary: IsoWords is the iPhone's first word search game wrapped onto a cube. Connect letters to form words, but watch out! The third time a letter is used its cube will be removed!

name: Isis: The Fall
summary:
Amidst centuries-long space conflict between the Alliance of Free Planets and the Neo-Terran Confederacy, allied cruiser FSS "Isis" is sent on a mission that could turn the tides of war. However, among it's crew, there's one officer that wants to pursue his own devious plan...
Isis: The Fall is a visual novel in which you follow one man's quest for revenge. Seven powerful female crew members of "Isis" are ripe for conquest; can you bring them to fall and save your homeland from another defeat?

name: Islands Might Fly
summary: ISLANDS MIGHT FLY is a tycoon and strategy hybrid game about recreating historical periods on an interplanetary station rotating somewhere in space. Manage staff and accommodate customers. Help to create dreams of the future to relive the past. You are now in charge of a giant cylinder.

name: Island Golf
summary:
Island Golf is a simple, easy-to-play arcade game where you play a quick round of golf with fairways on little lonely islands. There's no complex system of club types, swing meters or wind direction here. You just tap, drag, and release to take a shot.
Every day a new course appears. See if you can beat par on each hole, and how low you can score through all 18. If you do well, you may even make the high score board for that day. If not, there's always tomorrow.

name: ISEPS Idle Particle Simulator
summary: Create beautiful particle systems with tons of colors, patterns, and attributes and see them grow and move around in real-time!

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Special Edition
summary:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!
Be a master of fishing!

name: Iseran: Isekai Rantou
summary: 最大４人でみんなでバトルパーティー！！！ 異世界乱闘、ちぢめて「いせらん」！！！ ありとあらゆる異世界から集いし者たちは、今日もバトる！！！ 様々な世界の者たちが迷い込んでくる謎の世界、「マザワルド」！ここでは、色んな競技で熱く激しいバトルが繰り広げられるのは日常茶飯事だ！ 勝利を目指せ！！！Let’s！いせらん！！！

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Premium Edition
summary: This bundle includes eleven colors for your fly rod and your fishing net.

name: Island
summary: Cartoon 3D RPG Board Game, gathering, fighting monsters, exploring and solving puzzles, this world gathers characters from different eras to explore together and defeat the final Boss.

name: Isle of Maligree
summary: Become an investigator in a dark fantasy story. People keep going missing in Maligree, before being forgotten by all who knew them. Will you solve the case before you forget?

name: Islanders: VR Edition
summary:
Islanders is the critically acclaimed minimalist strategy game about building cities on colourful islands. Now coming to VR.

Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands, expand your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.

In Islanders: VR Edition, you begin with a blank canvas and a small set of minimalist buildings. Your goal is to populate and enrich each island with your creations, unlocking new buildings as you go by achieving a maximum score. Points are earned by carefully placing each building, being mindful of their surroundings like providing clear access to natural resources and making sure entry isn’t blocked.

When you’re ready, you can travel to a new land, exploring Islanders’ stunning new environments along the way, while building bigger, more expansive structures. The more you build, the higher your score will be and the grander city you’ll be able to gaze upon before starting all over again for just one more round.

name: Isekai: Slow Life
summary:
What the-? Been transported to isekai and turned into an adorable walking mushroom?!

In this wonderful new world, you will begin by managing and developing a small town while meeting and engaging with various types of beautiful and bizarre characters. Discover unknown lands with them as you wander at your leisure and enjoy the quiet life.

name: Island Casino
summary: Check-in to the El San Juan Hotel and Casino and hit the tables for 25 of the world's most popular casino games! Or learn to play with step-by-step, easy-to-understand instruction. Brilliant graphics and sophisticated gameplay put you right in the center of the non-stop casino action, and let you feel the thrill of hitting it big with the most complete and authentic gambling experience available on CD-ROM. It's your Virtual Vacation- and it's only a mouse-click away- Island Casino!

name: Isle of the Jötunn
summary: You are the sole survivor of a terrible shipwreck. The isle is rich with the resources to keep you alive but, it seems there is another inhabitant. A Jotun of fearsome strength has lived here for ages and doesn't enjoy visitors.

name: Isonzo: Reserve Units Pack
summary: The ‘Reserve Units’ pack contains rear-line uniforms for each class. The Italian uniforms include the infamous "Carabinieri Reali" police units and their archaic hats, while the Austro-Hungarians get the venerable "Standschützen". The pack comes with four elegant mustaches and four facial items.

name: Isonzo: Veteran Units Pack
summary: The ‘Veteran Units’ pack contains battle-worn uniforms from some of the most iconic units seen on the Italian Front, from the Italian Sardinian brigade and Bersaglieri to the Austro-Hungarian Honved. There are five mustaches and four facial items, plus one face for each faction.

name: Isonzo: Elite Units Pack
summary: The ‘Elite Units’ pack contains new historic uniforms for each class. The Italian uniforms include Bersaglieri Cyclists and Arditi troops, while the Austro-Hungarian uniforms include the feared Bosnian troops. Additionally the pack contains five iconic mustaches and three facial items.

name: Isonzo: Alpine Units Pack
summary: The ‘Alpine Units’ pack contains uniforms and gear worn by units in the winter as well as a range of rough beards! Italian troops enjoy white winter camo, while the Austro-Hungarians button up with heavy greatcoats. There are 5 mustaches and beards, with 3 facial items, plus 1 face for each faction.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Definitive Edition
summary:
Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

Meet the locals and get your tools. Sit down or stand and wait for pike, salmon, and other smaller or bigger fish to swallow the hook. Show everyone your trophies. Catch fish and artifacts with a fishing net or a suitable rod.

name: Island Master
summary: Build, manage, and thrive in Island Master! Procedural islands, resource control, citizen happiness. Become the ultimate Island Master in this top-down city builder.

name: Island Hopper
summary: Oh no! Your island got hit by a tornado. Can you rebuild your island and help out your friends? Enjoy randomly generated islands with different biomes to collect the resources you need to upgrade your gear and save your home. But don't leave the enemies out of your sight!

name: Isekai'd
summary: Be transported into a fantasy world with your friends in this open-world multiplayer RPG. Complete quests where your choices shape the outcome, defeat bosses, explore dungeons, and claim castles for your own guild.

name: Isla Mosa Adventure: The Secret of the Southern Capital
summary: Players will take control of "Hoki," to explore the unfamiliar and mysterious southern island, "Isla Mosa." In order to secure a place for the villagers on the island, Hoki promises the police to interact with two problematic individuals on the island, investigating the conspiracy behind them...

name: Isonzo: First Wave
summary: Enhance your Isonzo experience by requisitioning a variety of cosmetic Unit Pack DLCs with the Wave sets! First Wave includes all the core Isonzo Unit Pack DLCs: the Reserve Units, Veteran Units, Elite Units, and Alpine Units.

name: Isonzo: Glacial Units Pack
summary: The ‘Glacial Units’ pack contains a series of uniforms for unprepared troops struggling to keep warm or stay concealed in the freezing conditions of the wintery Alps. This pack has two sets of mostly improvised uniforms for all classes, plus moustaches and beards, facial items, and faces.

name: Isometria
summary: Explore a procedurally generated isometric world solo or with friends. Build a base, explore caves, dungeons, tombs, deserts, and forests. Fight monsters, defeat bosses, mine rare elements, craft armor, potions, and more!

name: Island Clash
summary: Island Clash is an adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced first-person shooter game! Unlock brand new weapons every time you eliminate enemies, with no ammunition limits, delivering a completely different shooting experience! Are you ready to take on the hail of bullets?

name: Ishida Yoshio Kudan no Igo Seiha
summary: An overhead view game of Go Conquest where you are taught by a master of the game.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Complete Edition
Island of Mogambo
summary: Island of Mogambo is a fast paced run-n-gun game that pays homage to the legendary Contra series while taking the action to new heights. Blast through waves of relentless enemies, navigate treacherous terrain, and tackle epic boss battles in a pixelated retro world.

name: I's Long Night
summary: A relaxed casual adventure game

name: Island Ops
summary: "Take a step, dive into Island Ops! Unexpected obstacles await you that secret agent Blade must overcome with his skills. Additionally, the secrets of hidden experiments and mutations lie in the depths of this story. Are you ready for this action-packed adventure?"

name: Isle of Echoes
summary: Isle of Echoes is a Grind Fiction VR Looter-Slasher with your spirit partner called an Echo. Upgrade their abilities as you go from region to region giving the power back to the people. As you get closer and closer to your goal, Aeon Park will be continuing his plan to take over the new world.

name: Isekai Frontline
summary: You are the only 'guy' in this zombie apocalypse world! Fight with endless zombie hordes and have a good time with cute girls!

name: Island of Mine
summary: Acquire new islands and step into the unknown! Who knows what awaits you on the next island?

name: Island Rush
summary: Welcome to Island Rush: Surfing Odyssey! Dive into an adventure where sun-kissed waves meet the thrill of the unknown. Choose your avatar, surf to a distant island, and overcome perilous obstacles. Every moment counts - swift action is your key to avoiding destruction.

name: Istanbul
summary: Four levels beginning in the early dawn in an Arabian/Greco- Roman style.

name: Isolation One
summary: Exciting action with puzzle elements and an interesting plot, which takes place on the huge spaceship Transporter P18. In this game, players will encounter an incredible mixture of science fiction and horror. Immerse yourself in a dark world where t you need to survive at any cost.

name: Is This Game Trying to Kill Me?
summary:
An old shack deep in a dense forest, a strange computer and a game that's trying to kill you!

Is this Game Trying to Kill Me? - it is a mix of horror and first-person puzzle. You are trapped inside a cabin deep in the forest, and its owner offers to play a computer game in exchange for freedom. But the cabin and the game are much more connected than you might think. Traps from the game begin to appear in reality, and your actions in the cabin affect the computer game. And very soon you realize that the stake in this game is your life!

name: Is This Even Chess?
summary: Prove you're worthy of King's Challenge! Master items, navigation, and combat in over 30 levels of increasing difficulty! Many contenders have failed before. Will you be able to defeat King and claim the ultimate prize?

name: (I see) Nothing
summary: (I see) Nothing is a drama Visual Novel with little bit of horror and denpa in certain storylines. The game let's you choose MC's name as well as gender and the chosen gender does slightly affect the game's art.

name: Isopod: A Webbed Spin-off
summary: You're a tiny pill-bug in a big world! From the creators of Webbed. Roll, zip, and slam your way through the gorgeous landscapes of the Australian bush, unite your fellow bugs, and fight back the greedy Fire Ant Conglomerate!

name: Isonzo: Second Wave
summary: The ‘Glacial Units' pack contains a set of improvised winter uniforms for Italy and Austria-Hungary. It contains a set of uniforms for all classes, plus headgear and facial items.

name: I Scream
summary: 2046, post-WWIII nation. You spent your childhood locked in the basement. After the rescue, you ended up at the Institution for Abused Children and befriended its outcasts. A day before leaving, your friend committed suicide... Why are you still able to see her?

name: I Still Live Under Your House
summary: You're a horrible monster living under someone's house.

name: Isabella: Chasing Shadows
summary: Isabella - Chasing Shadows is an erotic thriller with adult elements. Consumed, after the death of your fiancée, you’ll try to uncover the city’s darkest secrets. What connection does a ‘High Fashion’ model have to your fiancée’s death and can you protect those you care about? It’s up to you!

name: Isaac Asimov's The Ultimate Robot
summary: Interactive encyclopedia on Isaac Asimov and his theories of robotics. The program features video clips, robot schematics, encyclopedic information and other interesting stuff as well as clips of Asimov talking about the future of robots.

name: Is This Gay?
summary: You ever wanted to play a game that try's and gaslights you into being gay? Well I tell you what buddy call me the FBI.

name: Isabelle
summary: A surreal, truly arthouse and at least very unusual (and at most, one of a kind) three-dimensional quest, created as a thinly veiled satire on “local totalitarianism”.

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light
summary: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light is an upcoming game from Bushiroad Games.

name: Isekai Neet Engineer Eiyuu ni Naru
Isolated
summary: Stranded on a tiny island, your mission is to conquer each day until you can make it back home. Take charge of your character's hunger, life, and sleep, all while fishing, resting, and cooking. But watch out for a thrilling marine danger that adds an extra layer of excitement to this mortal adventure!

name: Isotopia
summary: A fast-paced first-person action game where you explore, fight, and destruct in a fully destructible voxel world, developing skills and uncovering the secrets of forgotten civilizations.

name: Iskhaar3D
summary: An in-depth space and economy simulation meets simple twin-stick controls. Iskhaari people have been exiled by the Khanid Emperor to a contested region of the galaxy. Through the means of military, economy and politics conquer this region for the House of Iskhaar.

name: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey
summary: This is an action game where you explore ruins buried in the forest with Ethnic BGM. Kijino, a cat-eared adventurer with two tails (Nekomata), goes on a journey around the ISEKIZIMA (Ruins Island of dreams and romance : as it was written in the tourist brochure).

name: Is It Wrong To Kiss The Bracken?!
summary: A fan-made Otome visual novel where you get to date the bracken from Lethal Company.

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Battle Chronicle
summary: An all-new action RPG for the popular anime series "Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?"!

name: Island Rise
summary: "Island Rise" is a captivating survival and adventure game where players build their own island, uncover its mysteries, and engage in gathering, farming, crafting, dungeon exploration, and epic boss battles. Stranded on a mysterious island, you must navigate its secrets and challenges to thrive.

name: Island Uncanny Story
summary: ‘Island Uncanny Story’ is a narrative-driven simulation and survival game where you play as a young graduate who boards a flight to Vesia Bay with five women of different professional backgrounds and personalities. However, the flight is forced to make an emergency landing on an island。

name: Isoland4: The Anchor of Memory
summary: ISOLAND4 is the fifth installment in the ISOLAND series by CottonGame. The game continues to feature the distinctive hand-drawn style of CottonGame, with point-and-click gameplay. The game also features a second playthrough mode, which allows players to gain a deeper understanding of the game.

name: Is it different or not?
summary: Your task is to scrutinize every corner of a schoolroom for differences. If the room is perfect, you can safely move forward. However, if you notice even the slightest difference, you must step back. Your primary weapon in this game is a keen eye and quick reaction time.

name: Iskelonia
summary: Crafting, plants, insects, mushrooms, ruins, in a semi-textual game

name: Isekai Infinity: Worlds Unleashed
summary: Accidently loosing her life, Aria finds her self in the spirit realm...her new life simple and relaxing is torn apart once more as she is thrust into another world. Will she have any OP skills in this new world? She must find her way back but finds that each time she fails another world awaits.

name: Isolation
summary:
Zuriumak, a small town in the Irrizzary District (Capital Zone), is right in the radius of the district's large laboratory, called Zaryeth. On any given day, an unfortunate mistake happens, causing an unidentified pathogen to spread in a considerable radius, but not so alarming as to put the whole district in isolation.

Zuriumak is within that radius, so the authorities decide only to make a quarantine of 15 days, praying that people don't leave their homes. Unexpectedly, the opposite happened, and the quarantine, which was estimated to last only two weeks, was extended indefinitely.

It has now been almost 2 years since the alert was sent out. And it is not known how many people from Zuriumak have survived... One family, still trying to survive as best they can, is slowly beginning to decay into despair without realizing it. Karey, the eldest son, is still in his right mind, though he assumes not so much. He wants to do something to save his mother and sister from the horrible situation they find themselves in.

Karey doesn't know how to deal with the situation... The only people he could feel safe with have decided to break the quarantine, but since then nothing has been heard from them until today... Karey finds something on his computer, something he thought wasn't real... An old message from his best friend, Haruzi.

What will Karey do next? Will he try to leave? But he can't unless he gets the keys to the cellar door, which his mother is so careful to hide. You have two ways, Karey... None of them are good. What do you plan to do?

name: Isonzo: Altitude Units Pack
summary: The ‘Altitude Units’ pack contains clothing for the extreme cold of high altitude Alpine Warfare. There are fur lined coats, thick boots, unique jackets, and dedicated ski uniforms, along with headgear variants, moustaches, goggles, pipes, and new faces.

name: i saw her too, with lasers
summary: The sequel to i saw her standing there. Desperate to find a cure, a mad scientist has captured two loving zombies in his laboratory. Control the laboratory lasers with your mouse.

name: i saw her across the world
summary:
The third installment of the acclaimed “i saw her standing there” series. Picking up right from the end of “i saw her too, with lasers”, you’ve gotta explore the entire world in a cross-continental game of zombie love tag.

Zombies. Love. Pancakes.

name: Isuta no Usagi
summary: A little jump and run puzzle game with some additional mini games within! The standalone release of the Geotastic Easter Egg Hunt game within a game. Can you find all 19 secrets? Enjoy this little platform er with handmade graphical assets and an original soundtrack.

name: Is This A Platformer?
summary: Play a fast paced action platformer where you fight grapes and a banana to save your dump brother.

name: Island Designer
summary: Turn islands into dream paradises in Island Designer! Buy, design, and sell unique retreats to satisfy clients, build your reputation, and unlock new challenges. Your vision is their paradise.

name: Isonzo: Third Wave
summary: From specialist high-altitude combat uniforms to exhausted and bloody late war veterans and ersatz troops, the Third Wave contains a broad variety of cosmetic options for Italian and Austro-Hungarian forces. It will also include a third DLC to be announced in the future!

name: Island Paradise
summary: Island Paradise is a survival game where you build, upgrade, customize your own island and use nearby resources to create a home for generations to come!

name: Island of Enchantment
summary: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things. This game can provide you with a relaxing experience while also exercising your intuition and concentration.

name: Isekai Truck Driver
summary: "ISEKAI Truck Driver" is a game where you drive a truck through the city, constantly searching for targets and transporting them. Complete missions assigned by goddesses, and have closer relationships.

name: Isekai Awakening
summary: A pixel art point-and-click RPG where you explore a medieval fantasy world and have relationships with beautiful girls.

name: Isekai Valley
summary: A 3D open world survival, farming and crafting multiplayer game, where you can survive, build, farm, craft, and catch to evolve your wild kin, the "Neuramons," into human-like beings like yourself!

name: Island Party Chaos
summary: Island Party Chaos: Dive into a hilarious multiplayer adventure! Navigate whimsical obstacles, conquer wild challenges, and outsmart rivals in the race to be the ultimate party champion. Get ready for laughter, strategy, and unpredictable mayhem – let the chaos begin!

name: Isekai: Warrior's Kiss
summary: Your passion for antiquity turns adventurous when you’re miraculously transported to the fantastical Kingdom of Lydia—where you’re hailed as the Phoenix! Your prophesied destiny unites you with four Celestial Warriors—a Fire Dog, Dragon, Kitsune, and Wind Horse—to journey daring heights across a vibrant, ancient world in search of the fabled Serpent Stones. Will you find the artifacts you seek—not to mention true loyalty and companionship with these mythical fighters from the East?

name: Island Xtreme Stunts
summary: Island Xtreme Stunts is a mixture of different genres in a single game. The player goes through a level-select on the overworld to choose each mission. You ride a skateboard, drive, fly and more, while sometimes taking on the evil Brickster. The player is cast as Pepper Roni, a lead stuntman in a big movie production set on LEGO Island.

name: I Saw A Strange Little Man
summary: A mostly non-video exploration game where you discover the story of a fantasy world from characters, discover secrets, and ultimately search for a bottle.

name: Isonzo: Ultimate Edition
summary: The Isonzo Ultimate Edition includes every visual customization option the game has to offer: 100s of items from 10 DLCs!

name: Is it OK to pick up Anomalies at a University?
summary: Which SCP will you bring to prom as your date?

name: Island Adventure 3: Penultimate Climax
summary: Yet more humor and peril! Can you survive the zombies? Can you endure the girls! Will you ever make it home? A one player point and click adventure game. With multiple different endings dependent on choices made (entering codes from last game allows for even more variation!) 3D stereoscopic version included (red/cyan 3d glasses needed) Game contains some adult humor and innuendo.

name: Isonzo: Expedition Units
summary: The ‘Expedition Units' pack expands the German faction with a set of winter themed uniforms and accessories, plus a set of battle hardened elite troops. It contains two sets of uniforms for all classes, plus a wealth of headgear options.

name: Is this Game Trying to Kill Me? Preface
summary: This is a small free prequel to the Is this Game Trying to Kill Me?. An old cabin deep in the dense forest, a strange computer, and a game that's trying to kill you!

name: Island, Sex & Survival
summary: You began a new life on the mysterious deserted island after drifting there due to a shipwreck, starting from scratch. Building a base, exploring different areas of the island, living alongside various female characters you encounter, and experiencing all sorts of miraculous events.

name: Is it Wrong to Want to be Locked up, Toyed with and Tortured by a Hot Guy?
summary:
Mamiya Hibiki is a regular guy with not so regular interests. He’s a huge fan of the decade-old drama series Possessive Boyfriends, and his favourite character by far is Kirisaki Shin: a deranged yandere who expresses his love with continuous threats of entrapment, torture, and murder.

Hibiki might enjoy fictional characters threatening to kill him, but he’s far less receptive about real men teasing him about these desires.

That’s what Hibiki thinks, at least – until he runs into his silver-tongued tormentor yet again, and things start to get serious…

name: Isles of Silence
summary: An Incremental Management game about hunting increasingly fearsome monsters, using their materials to grow stronger and build a colony of survivors, each with their own unique mechanics. Expand further into the Isles of Silence and uncover the mystery of the events that led to your world's calamity.

name: Iso-Core
summary: Farm, craft, build, and explore a Beautiful isometric pixel art world. Explore new places and find new biomes to expand your list of items, buildings, and recipes.

name: Isle o' Little Men
summary:
Isle o Little Men is a

3d,2d,point and click,action,adventure,visual novel EVERYTHING.

EVERYTHING PACKED IN ONE GAME. GAME OF THE YEAR 2023.

Made for 1-Bit Jam in 1 week

name: Island Escape 2
summary: You are stranded on an island, and here you can do quests for the inhabitants, level up your character, build whatever you want, play with cool weapons and much more. Your goal is however to find a way off the island and find out how you got there. As mentioned, you can build, craft, and you can also manipulate the island's terrain.

name: Isle of Reveries
summary: Make a pilgrimage skybound to the Isle of Reveries, where any wish can be granted. Conquer mysterious dungeons, solve head-scratching puzzles, and fight dangerous enemies in this retro-inspired action adventure.

name: Isolation Instinct: Farming, Craft, Survival
summary: Show your ability to survive! Be a part of a wild world with unlimited borders!

name: IsoCraft Story
summary: Isocraft Story is an isometric Minecraft-like sandbox game. Shape the infinite and procedurally-generated block world. Collect materials, play online, advance to higher tiers of tools and weapons, go deeper into the world and build a new spaceship to escape from this planet!

name: Island Survival: Craft, Build, Grow
summary: From Shipwreck to Escape: Master Survival.

name: Is It Woke?
summary: Is It Woke? is a browser game where one has to guess wither or not a video game is considered "woke" or not based upon a spreadsheet created by the Steam group Woke Content Detector. The player gets a point every single question in a they get right, however if they get one wrong, they lose a point.

name: I.S.I.S.
summary: I.S.I.S. allows you to play as an indifferent, or malevolent, artificial intelligence trapped on a space station with a single human crew member.

name: Island Dwellers
summary: Island Dwellers is a calm, turn-based strategy game where you guide a small island tribe through the challenges of rising sea levels. Manage your growing population, gather resources, and explore new islands to secure the future of your tribe.

name: Isekai Survivors
summary: Isekai survivors is an Action roguelite with RPG elements and addictive gameplay loop, cute stylized art style and attractive heroines with unique playstyles to choose from. Collect items, complete quests, upgrade your stats and learn new powerful spells to dominate the battlefield.

name: Islamic Fun
summary: Islamic Fun is a 1999 religious and educational video game, consisting of six minigames targeted at children. The game was developed by the United Kingdom-based firm Innovative Minds. The game is notable for its minigame "The Resistance" which allowed players to throw rocks at Israeli tanks upon correctly answering trivia.

name: Isaac Phens: Ace Attorney
summary: The game takes place about the same time as Trials and Tribulations. It follows a new Defense Attorney: Isaac Phens. While he is starting fresh, you shouldn't judge a book by its cover. With an all-new ability (that just so happens to use the Thought Route background), Isaac is ready to prove his clients are innocent!

name: Island Keeper
summary: Earth's pollution is at record highs and only you can save your planet! Collect rubbish, recycle; improve yourself and your base. Explore the archipelago of islands in the endless ocean, its inhabitants as well as the underwater world.

name: Isoland: Pumpkin Town
summary: ISOLAND Pumpkin Town? What the hell kind of game is this and what does it have to do with ISOLAND, Mr Pumpkin.

name: Isle of Birds
summary: Isle of Birds is a cute and cozy Town Builder about populating an island with, well... birds! Place and merge a diverse array of feathered friends to build colourful and varied high-rise bird houses until your island runs out of space!

name: Is it okay for me to live
summary:
A strange little Windows 98 style game about life, made for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2024.

Based on some dreams and strange trips, combined into something more akin to an experience versus a traditional story. Heavy inspirations from Tsui no Sora and its peers.

name: Isekai-ya
summary: An adorable cooking game where you hop around many worlds, finding new ingredients to whip up new recipes. Get to meet a variety of customers of all races and background as you immerse yourself in the flow and frenzy of running a restaurant.

name: Isekai Saga: Awaken
summary: In the Isekai world, adventure never stops! Place upgrades, heroes break through levels! Flexible strategies, multiple gameplay, simple operations, rich experience!

name: Islets Defense
summary: Islets Defense is a turn-based tower defense game where you build a small village to earn resources and defend your castle.

name: Island Raiders: War of Legends
summary: Island Raiders is a dynamic online game with real-time war strategy. Develop your island’s clan, recruit legendary heroes, build a powerful army, and clash with millions of online players in an age of war and domination. Island raiders are here, and we are unstoppable!

name: Isekaing: From Zero to Zero
summary: Zoe is hit by the Truck-kun, and respawns in a pixel-art game, where she must face dangers in form of clichés, meaningless choices, a plot that has more holes than Swiss cheese, and other plagues of modern gaming. Also, every notable person is trying to sing her a song! Will she endure such torment?

name: Iseikan Renai Guide: Interplanetary Love Guide
summary: This PC game is a love simulation game set in the distant future where interstellar travel has become commonplace. Slavery, crime, violence... Interact with unique aliens and form close relationships with them in a world where anything is possible, where high technology and low technology coexist.

name: Island of Sacrifice
summary: An indie horror and puzzles game created by a solo developer using the Unreal Engine 5 (UE5). Challenge your mind, think differently, and immerse yourself in a unique and thrilling experience.

name: ISS Simulator
summary: The ultimate space simulator game, precisely modeling the space and space environment inside the International Space Station (ISS).

name: Island of Despair
summary: An episode 3 replacement for Heretic to celebrate its 30th anniversary.

name: Issho ni Henshin Fresh Pretty Cure
Isles of Krom
summary: Isles of Krom is a top-down action roguelike that combines the visceral and demanding combat of a Souls-like games with the deep character-building and progression systems of the best roguelikes.

name: Is This Seat Taken?
summary: Is This Seat Taken? is a logic puzzle game where you play matchmaker for groups of hilariously particular people. Each character has pet peeves that make seating them a delightful challenge. Find the perfect spot for each person to unlock new levels in this cozy, silly, and relatable experience.

name: Isadora's Edge
summary: Can you keep going when all hope is lost? Isadora's Edge is a 2D Action Platformer with a unique future fantasy setting. Explore an alien world, battle against the corrupted forces bringing it to the edge of destruction, and uncover the secrets behind its impending demise!

name: Isolation
summary: One can be too alone...

name: IslaNode Rescue Signal
summary: IslaNode Rescue Signal it is a unique survival adventure ,set on deserted island where you have nothing but natural resources. Stranded alone, you’ll need to explore, gather materials, and craft with unique node-based crafting system.

name: Isopod Keeping Simulator
summary: Grow, feed and care for your colony of adorable isopods in this realistic semi-idle simulator. Watch your isopods multiply and split or sell your colony if they become too numerous. Created by the Kunstaat community, 100% of our proceeds support charity!

name: I Spy: Challenger!
summary: A multiplayer I SPY game released on the Microsoft Store.

name: Ispitatel 4: Classic
summary:
It's a comical adventure about a Russian scientist - Ravil Unisovich, who unwittingly unleashes a plague of monsters after an unsuccessful experiment.
The story takes place between 1986 - 2007 with lots of new locations to visit and new characters to meet.

name: Islanders: New Shores
summary: Welcome to ISLANDERS: New Shores. Build your island retreat in a calm, minimalist world with exciting new features that keep the classic charm while inspiring fresh creativity.

name: Isekai Harem Quest: Love, Blades, and Power
summary: Reincarnated as the strongest man in another world, you share a mansion with three women: knight Alize, maid Giselle, and mysterious Mio. Despite your power, they're cold to you. Through dialogue choices, win their hearts in this romance adventure. Can you turn their icy attitudes into a warm harem?

name: Isha's Magic Book Decoding
summary: Together with the wizard Isha, embark on a roguelike adventure to decipher the magic book and resolve the anomalies occurring in this land!

name: Island Rescue
summary: Rescue the stranded in this addictive puzzler

name: Is There a Way?
summary: Is there a way? - is a visual novel in which you will immerse yourself in the times of the USSR. You will have to reveal the details of your own story, find accomplices and solve the mysteries of the psychiatric hospital «Turov».

name: Isles Above
summary: Take control of Ribbit, the brave astronaut frog, and explore a charming floating island world. Collect coins and energy crystals, pilot your spaceship, and enjoy a cozy, stress-free platformer adventure.

name: Islash
summary: iSlash is an addictive slashing puzzle where your finger is your weapon. Swipe to slash your way through 240 amazing levels(more to come for free). Keep an eye on the ninja stars; some are fast, some are ghosts, but all are deadly. Destroy most of the play-shape, and you'll advance to the next one. Open your ninja senses and let the fun begin!

name: Isomerica
summary: A new visual novel by Laplacian written by Ono Wasabi. It will be approximately 20 hours long.

name: Island Robot Farm
summary: Build a super large island with robots in this relaxing idle farm simulation game. Assign tasks to robots to plant, raise animals and build various buildings to expand your island. Even when you're busy, the game can run quietly at the corner or bottom of the screen and keep developing your farm.

name: Isle Frontier
summary: Isle Frontier is an isometric point-and-click life simulator where you can build a homestead on your own personal island. Live on your own by utilizing your vast array of skills, such as fishing, hunting, cooking, crafting, and more.

name: Isekai Mage
summary: Protagonist dies in a truck accident, reborn as a Mage Adventurer in an isekai. Explore chests, battle monsters, complete quests, and customize skills via roguelike mechanics. Defeat the Demon King in this blend of RPG, adventure, and light roguelike.

name: Island Survival: Craft, Build, Grow & Zombie Harvest: Survival Farming Simulator Bundle Collection
summary: Two survival paths. One goal: make it through.

name: Isles of Sea and Sky: Mysterious Update
summary:
For puzzle novices and experts: Isles of Sea and Sky is designed for all skill levels making sure there’s plenty to do, collect, and challenge yourself with if you’re a puzzle expert, but that the game is also approachable for puzzling beginners.
- Immerse yourself in a serene, vibrant world: This vibrant, retro, and atmospheric environment is captivating and offers a chill and ambient soundtrack for deeper gameplay immersion
- Uncover a rich, meaningful story: Isles of Sea and Sky tells a meaningful and memorable story utilizing only images and no text.
- Discover hidden secrets: The game is chock full of hidden items and areas. Getting 100% completion rate is no easy task!

name: Isekat: Crushed by a Computer, My Beloved Kitten is Transported to a Fantasy World where its Typing Skills Save the Kingdom!
summary: A typing game where you play the role of an unfortunate kitten from our world who unexpectedly dies and wakes up in a fantasy world of swords, magic and anthromorphic animal people!

name: Isoforge
summary: Build your dream city on a vast island in Isoforge! Unlock new buildings every in-game day, each influencing others in unique ways. Recruit soldiers to defend against invasions, manage upgrades, and tackle dynamic events like unlocks and challenges. Can you create the ultimate city?

name: Isles of Rain
summary: Melancholy Islands where it always rains. A 3rd Person adventure.

name: Is Your House Almost There?
summary: Become a stone and share the journey home with a human.

name: Islantiles
summary: Islantiles is a cozy, minimalistic city-builder where you raise your civilization from adorable settlers to ridiculously effective explorers. Unlock groundbreaking technologies as you venture across a chain of unknown islands and discover over-the-top synergies.

name: Isles & Tiles
summary: Isles & Tiles is a turn-based colony builder with terraforming and deck-builder elements. Balance resource production and demands while raising your island, growing a colony, and providing for the needs of your settlers.

name: Isekai Mining Defense
summary: NAD blends tower defense with roguelike, crafting, and sandbox elements, offering a rich gameplay experience with a main story, unlockable content, multiple endings, and more!

name: Isekai: I'm an FPS Hero Who Was Summoned to Another World
summary: I'm a die-hard FPS gamer. By mistake, I became the hero of an Isekai story. An incompetent Goddess summoned me to her world to defeat the Demon Lord. I'm in my element—guns, upgrades, action, and hordes of monsters to slay. There's even some magic… and Goddesses…

name: Isekai Adventurer Guild
summary: One day, countless Isekai adventurers were suddenly summoned, and at the same time, numerous monsters appeared. As the master of the Adventurers Guild, you will train adventurers to solve the anomalies. Experience the fun of SRPG alongside various adventurers!

name: Island Supermarket Simulator
summary: Island Market Simulator is a relaxing shop management game where you run your own store on a beautiful island. Expand your business by buying making sure all your products are in stock, purchasing more shelves and storage, and purchasing more space to increase the size of your shop!

name: I See Me
summary: Overcome the trials by relying on your partner's sights! A 3D co-op game that goes beyond common sense. Enjoy unique gameplay based on sights in I See Me.

name: Island Market Simulator
summary: Island Market Simulator – In this strategy and economy simulation game set in an island town, build your trade empire by starting with a small market. Produce your goods through farming, livestock, and supply chain management, and expand your business with seasonal dynamics and festivals!

name: Islanders: New Shores - Photo Filter Pack
summary:
Photo mode in ISLANDERS: New Shores allows you to immortalise your highest scoring island, or show the world your island empire you spent hours in Sanbox mode to make. This pack brings 10 more unique filters to give your screenshots a whole new look.

Included Filters:
- VHS
- Water Color
- Ink
- Cross Hatch
- Kuwahara
- ASCII
- Kaleidoscope
- BUILD
- Vaporwave
- Ghost Vision

name: Islanders: New Shores - The Scenic Builders Pack
summary:
Explore infinite new shores and capture the moments in style.
Explore infinite new shores and capture the moments in style with ISLANDERS: New Shores and 10 Photo Mode Filters.

Included:

ISLANDERS: New Shores - Build your island retreat in a calm, minimalist world with exciting new features that keep the classic charm while inspiring fresh creativity.

ISLANDERS: New Shores Photo Filter Pack - Add new layers to photo mode with 10 fresh filters to capture the moment with.

name: Islanders: New Shores - Island Hopping Bundle
summary: Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands across both games.

name: Islanders: New Shores - The Full Archipelago Bundle
summary: Explore everything the ISLANDERS series has to offer.

name: Island Off Outer Darkness
summary: A narrative delivery simulator following the Postman, a Postal Worker new to a small fishing village off the coast of a volcano. As they do their doldrum job delivering mail to residents day-by-day, they begin to experience space-warping aberrations.

name: Is this a Game yet?
summary: Is this a Game yet? is a blank slate that players cooperatively design. Starting with just a button, you compete every week for 5 spots on a global leaderboard to have your idea implemented in the next update live on stream.

name: Is the Vat Utopia or Dystopia?
summary: "We regret to inform you that the Earth has been demolished." Coming next—a "Human Observation Documentary" starring "Landmine Girl" (self-proclaimed) and "Nerd" (so-called).

name: Ispell
summary: Ispell is a shoot'em up & bullet hell game where you take on the role of a nameless android who wanders through the dying worlds. Use various weapons and dodge enemy bullets, as well as challenge powerful creatures.

name: İstanbul Puzzle
summary: İstanbul Puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details! You will find as many as 15 puzzle levels with juicy graphics and an History-style plot that you will need to add up.

name: I Scream Ice Cream
summary: I Scream Ice Cream is a physics-based action game where players control an Ice Cream Soul through 30 levels using voice commands. Players navigate obstacles by literally shouting "Ice Cream" into their microphone, creating a unique voice-controlled gameplay experience that combines precision movement with audio input.

name: Island Life With Mayalala
summary:
Akitoshi decided to take a vacation on Earth to rest and recover from the drudge of office life. Everything was perfect… Until a sudden storm sank the ship he was on! Now he’s been washed ashore on a random island in the middle of who knows where, attacked by a wild animal, and saved by a mysterious young woman. What will happen to him now?

Get to know your savior, investigate the island… Do whatever you have to in order to survive and escape this tropical nightmare in this island exploration adventure RPG!

name: Isaacle
summary: A daily game where players attempt to guess the mystery Binding of Isaac item; each incorrect answer will reveal information about the target item.

name: Island World
summary: Are you ready for a new life on the Island World? Keep yourself alive, level up and gain skill points to spend on whatever you like to build next! Fight your enemies with self-crafted weapons and armor.

name: Island Beekeeper
summary: Island Beekeeper is a cozy sim where you harvest miraculous honey from sky islands to save a dying Earth. Explore biomes, breed exotic bees, craft elixirs and dishes. Relaxing farming, crafting and adventure with meditative cycles and mini-games.

name: Isogashii Hito no Tame no Koumakyou
summary: A visual novel following Aya and the residents of the Scarlet Devil Mansion recreating the events of Embodiment of Scarlet Devil.

name: Isekai Mystic World
summary: Your wish has been granted, and now you are in another world. Isekai Mystic World is an action adventure game featuring exploration, farming, fishing, crafting, and building. Come explore solo or with your friends.

name: Isekai x Isekai: Tsugi ha Dono Sakuhin wo
Is This a Game?
summary: Is THIS a game? Well, it has everything you'd expect: buttons, pixels, achievements, a mouse-cursor to point and click sometimes, an axolotl, more than 50 mini-”games”. Is this enough? What even is a game? How much interactivity do you need? Are games art? Are there TOO many axolotls in this game?

name: I Suppose
summary: A story of a simple walk home, with a sprinkling of intrusive thoughts. Make a few choices, decide what's best, and please, try not to overthink.

name: Islet Hell
summary: This is a flight simulator in which you control a plane flying over a sea of small islands. The game is organized in a series of 10 levels of increasing difficulty. You have to shoot down all enemy planes and sink all enemy ships in order to win at each level. A radar at the bottom right of the screen allows you to locate all enemies as red dots with regard to your position, which is a black dot at the middle of the radar. Navigate the plane with the arrow keys in typical flight-simulator style: Left and Right for roll and Up and Down for pitch motion. Shoot with the space-bar. That is all! You have no bombs so you have to sink ships by simply shooting at them. However, they can fire missiles at you.

name: Isle of the Eagle
summary: A beautiful open world/exploration eagle simulator game that takes place in Alaska! Fly from island to island with incredibly fun and realistic flying controls! Complete mini quests! Unlock special abilities! Discover Treasure! Controllers supported: PS5, Xbox, or PC Keyboard.

name: Istorii Uzhasov: Voskreshenie
summary:
Delve into Istorii Uzhasov: Voskreshenie (Horror Stories: Resurrection), a chilling psychological horror game where the line between life and death blurs. This isn't a tale about death; it's a story of life triumphing over it, a terrifying descent into the resurrected.

The narrative follows Alex, a distraught writer who lost his wife amidst ominous and mystical circumstances. Desperate to reconnect with her in the afterlife and uncover the truth behind her demise, he embarks on a perilous journey into the unknown. Prepare for a suspenseful story filled with dark mysteries and paranormal activities.

name: Istoriya Bomzha
summary: Dive into the immersive world of Istoriya Bomzha (The Story of a Homeless Person), a unique third-person survival game where you embody a resourceful, albeit down-on-his-luck, homeless individual. Navigate the challenges of urban survival and experience a surprisingly cheerful story amidst the grit of the streets.

name: Isle of Poochimon
summary: Isle of Pochimoon is a Bullet Heaven game that blends life-simulation elements, including a building system, crafting, selling products at a convenience store, fishing, taming Pochimoon, and Pochimoon Fusion where you can fuse two Pochimoon to create an entirely new one that help you in combat.

name: I Saw a Flying Saucer
summary: An interactive fiction about a man who lost his wife and goes in search of a UFO that shouldn't exist.

name: Island of Death: Demons and Despair
summary: When they decided to spend their honeymoon on a wonderful island retreat, Natalie and John could not imagine the terrible experiments that would be conducted on them. Right when the couple arrived at the island, demons broke out and attacked the island’s inhabitants and infected everyone with a mysterious disease. Fortunately, Natalie managed to avoid infection. Help Natalie find a way to cure John in Island of Death: Demons and Despair.

name: Island Treasure Chase
summary: We explore the pirate island searching for treasures and trying to escape from skeletons.

name: Isekai Emblem
summary: Test your isekai anime knowledge!

name: Island of 16 Sisters
summary: What mystery is hidden on the island with sixteen beautiful girls? One day Robert wakes up on a cold pavement in the middle of a small town on an unknown island. Soon he finds out he's not alone. There are 16 beautiful girls and a mysterious Father living on the island. What's the secret behind all of this?

name: Island of Hearts
summary: After a rough breakup, you do what any reasonable person would: run away to a remote tropical island full of beautiful strangers. There, you’ll meet six captivating women, each with her own charm, secrets, and questionable taste in men. Your choices decide who you love, lose, or accidentally ghost.

name: Isonzo: First Wave Edition
summary: The Isonzo First Wave Edition includes a huge array of visual customization options: 140 items from four DLCs: ‘Elite Units', ‘Veteran Units', ‘Reserve Units', and ‘Alpine Units'.

name: Isonzo: Shellshocked Units Pack
summary: The ‘Shellshocked Units’ pack contains battleworn uniforms and items. It includes torn and patched up clothing, ersatz equipment, stripped down uniforms with only the essentials, and bloodied faces with hastily bandaged wounds.

name: Isonzo: Avanti Savoia Units Pack
summary: The ‘Avanti Savoia Units’ pack contains iconic staff officer uniforms, breezy waistcoats kitted with TNT, armored visors & late-war camouflaged helmets. It also includes new character faces alongside distinguished accessories & burly facial hair options to decorate them with.

name: Isonzo: Movember Handlebar
summary: Support the Movember movement in-game! Unlock the extravagant ‘Handlebar’ moustache to adorn the upper lip of soldiers of every faction. Proceeds are donated to the Movember Foundation charity.

name: I Sell Lemonade
summary: This is not just a business sim. It’s a story about small things that change you. And the summer that made you stronger.

name: Island Deck
summary: "Island Deck" is a turn-based strategy game combined with island construction. Build your island with the cards in your hand, gather resources, and complete various tasks assigned by the king.

name: Isekai Training
summary: Abandon your past life; this one hinges on training and survival. In a world of magic and monsters, spark fire, raise a timber keep—Observe, Prepare, Adapt, Restrain—carve through wilds, dungeons.

name: Isekai Revitalizer
summary: Explore the world of Miliene and watch as Gonzo’s saga unfolds in this story-driven visual novel! Meet the dynamic cast and experience a whole new world with Gonzo’s second chance at life. How will he take his 98 years of experience on earth and change this world? It’s up to you to find out!

name: Isophoria
summary: A narrative RPG set in a surreal cyberpunk world. Be a good neighbor or a sly opportunist. Play retro mini games to complete niche gigs. Hack your nervous system with dubious technology and navigate the strange side effects. Find your way through somehow, just don't get lost in the back alleys.

name: Isle of Lament
summary: Isle of Lament is a first-person mystery game set on a haunted island. Uncover its dark secrets as you explore eerie landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and wield supernatural abilities to track and banish vengeful spirits. Can you break the curse before it claims you?

name: Israel vs. Iran: Iron Dome
summary: DEFEND the promised land in an all-out war against Israel's historic enemy Iran in this fast-paced Missile Command inspired arcade shooter!

name: Island of Challenge
summary: Are you ready for the challenge? Face monsters in a 2D pixel art bullet hell to prove your worth and join Captain Valdo's pirate crew! Step into Geraldo's shoes, choose your weapon, buy upgrades, and grow stronger on this journey. What are you waiting for? The crew is waiting for you!

name: Isles of Wrath
summary:
A single-player, medieval fantasy themed pixel-art strategic auto-battler with roguelike elements.

Defend your outpost against continuous waves of monsters. Between waves, recruit new units, upgrade your army, and optimize synergies to counter increasingly large and varied enemy forces.

name: Island of Lost Things
summary: Play as Eric, a spirit medium, who is navigating the space between life and death. Help trapped souls by recovering items from their past, reconnecting them with their lives, and guiding them to make the ultimate decision: return to life or pass on to whatever comes next.

name: Isolated Hours
summary: A 3D horror game where your only goal is to finish your work… and survive the night. Unnatural anomalies creep into the office as you complete your tasks. Can you make it to the end of your shift alive.

name: Isernsmith
summary: Isernsmith is a gothic action-adventure RPG where you have to explore dungeons, gather resources, and forge new weapons and tools to overcome a tyrannical order.

name: I Shouldn’t Have Drawn That!
summary: Decks are dungeons. Each turn reveals four cards and you must face three: fight monsters, swap weapons, or manage your health in this single player rougelike dungeon crawler. Build custom dungeons and share runs with your friends using the same shuffled decks, so everyone faces the same challenges!

name: Isida
summary: How did I end up in this mysterious dungeon? Where do I get such magical abilities? Who am I really? I won't stay here forever! Explore the world, solve mysteries, find out the secret of your origin and escape from this dark place!

name: Isle of Titans
summary: Isle of Titans is an idle tower defense game where you defend a small kingdom against giant invaders. Shape your build with long-term progression between runs, and adapt on the fly during each run to hold back endless waves of Titans.

name: Isolated Inhale
summary: You are a spaceship pilot in an abandoned sector. Your job is to complete tasks and service stations. To reach your destination, you need to monitor your ship and its systems during the flight. Also, don't forget about the strange things that can happen to you, so be on your guard.

name: Is it True? Castle True-or-False Quiz
summary:
See through the Truth of Castles!
Challenge the Common Sense Quiz on Japanese Castles with True or False

name: Island of Ash
summary: A 3rd-person action-adventure inspired by cult classics. Explore a unique, solo-developed world and vanquish foes in intense battles. Level up your hero and reveal the secrets of a civilization that crumbled into dust five centuries ago.

name: Islay Quest
summary:
Visit Islay's ten distilleries and go sightseeing from the comfort of your internet browser!
Can you solve the ileachs' cask storage issues? Probably not!

name: Isle Of Food
summary:
Isle of Food is a VR cooking and exploration game set on a tropical island,
where every ingredient begins in the open world. You hunt, fish, gather and
grow what you need, then prepare dishes using natural hands-on VR cooking.

name: Iseki
summary: Embark on an ancient adventure, uncovering secrets in a 3D dungeon. Automatic combat based on Memory Threads, each with unique abilities. Manage fuel for exploration; depletion means retreat. Expand fuel, collect Threads, follow commands, and discover ancient mysteries.

name: Is this potato?
summary:
Where is this potato hiding?
A cute and easy picture-finding brain training game
